Class CircularBoundObject

java.lang.Object
  PhysicsObject
      CircularBoundObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
PhysicsObjectInterface
public class CircularBoundObject
extends PhysicsObject

Class that has all the fields and methods pertaining to on screen circular objects

See Also:
PhysicsObject

velocity - The velocity of the object
quadrent - The quadrent the object is located in
elasticity - The elasticity of the object
radius - The initial radius of the object
